posts.post_title: SOLD: pair of beaters, Polar Bear Schirm & Piedmont Moran...
posts.post_content:
For sale is a pair of beater T206s.

The price is $SOLD, net to me, postpaid via fortified PWE or $SOLD via bubble mailer, in the continental U.S. Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiations.  :rolleyes:

Please contact me if interested or if you have any questions. Thank you.
